title: Ayurvedic Cold-Pressed Coconut Oil
excerpt: Pure organic cold-pressed coconut oil for cooking, hair care, and skin nourishment in Ayurvedic routines.
content:
## What Is This Cold-Pressed Coconut Oil?
A pure, virgin, cold-pressed coconut oil that can be used for cooking, hair care, and skin nourishment. Naturally antimicrobial and cooling.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Coconut oil is cooling, soothing, and pacifies Pitta and Vata when used moderately. Ideal for head massage, skin moisturization, and medium-heat cooking.

### Key Benefits
- Moisturizes skin deeply.
- Strengthens and conditions hair.
- Supports healthy digestion when used in moderation.

## Ingredients
- Organic virgin coconut oil (cold-pressed)

## Usage Instructions
- Cooking at medium heat.
- Apply warm oil to hair before washing.
- Use on skin as moisturizer.

## Packaging
- Glass jar with airtight lid.

## Safety & Consultation
- Not ideal for Kapha-dominant individuals in cold weather. Consult for cholesterol management.

## Why Choose This Oil?
A versatile, clean, Ayurvedic staple for daily lifestyle and self-care rituals.
